title: Do Your Own VP8-Like 3D Images of the Shroud of Turin
post:
You wanna laugh, go see this very good comparison made by one of my French friend, Thibault Heimburger : http://www.acheiropoietos.info/proceedings/HeimburgerWeb.pdf
On page 8, you’ll see the 3D comparison.  Garlaschelli’s pseudo-Shroud is not even near a real 3D rendering ! :) 
It’s normal because the Shroud wasn’t create by a forger…
